name: True Backrooms
description:
The most accurate depiction of the backrooms.

Wander an ever growing maze in this horror themed walking simulator. Try to escape before you succumb to madness or before any monsters notice you. You might not be alone. Game length varies wildly dependent on the player, but most can expect a 20-40 minute horror experience.

Features:
Cool retro graphics.
4:3 aspect ratio.
General controller support.
Unique Scares.
A huge labyrinthine plane of existence.

Too many games miss the mark when it comes to recreating the backrooms. It should be about getting lost, losing hope, and going insane from the monotony. So I have created it. Can you reach the end of the backrooms?

Warning: This game is designed to make you experience insanity, player discretion is advised, and the game contains some flashing lights.
